channel.title: How do you do this?
channel.description:
how do you make it so a player needs a item to use a object.
Eg, i have a object that tele's you somewere when you click it, how do i make it so someone must have a item to beable to make it tele them?

item.title: How do you do this?
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

i’ll see if that wrks
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2007, 04:59:35 AM[/size][hr]nope

Read full topic

item.title: How do you do this?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Add this to your object

if(!playerHasItem(itemID, AMT)); { }else{ teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; } break;

Or something like that
It makes it so if they don’t have the itemID and the AMT, it won’t teleport them.

Read full topic
